ivardefs.name: capabilities
ivardefs.desc: Minimum capabilities required of server for test script to execute successfully.   If server does not meet at a minimum the referenced capability statement, then all tests in this script are skipped.

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: Description of the capabilities that this test script is requiring the server to support.

ivardefs.name: destination
ivardefs.desc: Which server these requirements apply to.

ivardefs.name: link_
ivardefs.desc: Links to the FHIR specification that describes this interaction and the resources involved in more detail.

ivardefs.name: origin_
ivardefs.desc: Which origin server these requirements apply to.

ivardefs.name: required
ivardefs.desc: Whether or not the test execution will require the given capabilities of the server in order for this test script to execute.

ivardefs.name: validated
ivardefs.desc: Whether or not the test execution will validate the given capabilities of the server in order for this test script to execute.

properties.desc: Capabilities that must exist and are assumed to function correctly on the FHIR server being tested.
